So, for the first time, I'm going to meet my furisode.

When I say Aichi, I mean Sokoname. Please come to Sokoname.
Now, let's proceed.

This place is famous for pottery.
Keep on walking.

I was so happy to meet so many children.

Hearts.

How was it?
I often visit Tokumusume, but it was my first time to come to the pottery walkway, so I was very happy.
It is a very peaceful and wonderful place where I met the big Tokumusume and many other potters.
